name: Amber Light
description:
Amber Light follow Cassie as she left and arrived on an isolated lighthouse in the middle of nowhere and trying to be okay again

(Recommended playing in fullscreen)

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Mouse Click / E: Interact

Credits:
